alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 18 at 10:17AM EST until December 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Locally higher amounts possible. Northwest wind gusts of 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...In Indiana, Elkhart and Eastern St. Joseph IN Counties. In Michigan, Cass MI, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Highly variable roadway conditions and visibility have been reported. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
